text: The Southern Railway has announced the operation of the following special train: Train No.00641 Secunderabad – Tiruchi Suvidha Superfast Special train will leave Secunderabad at 4.25 p.m. on January 18 and reach Tiruchi at 11.30 a.m. on January 19. The train would halt at Kazipet, Warangal, Khammam, Vijayawada, Ongole, Nellore, Gudur, Sullurupeta, Chennai Egmore, Tambaram, Chengalpattu, Villupuram, Vriddhachalam and Srirangam. The train would have an AC 2-tier, three AC 3-tier, 13 Sleeper Class and two second class-cum-luggage coaches. Advance reservation for the train is open, a press release said.
title: Special train
